nodes.text: Some time preceding the events of the Battle of Geonosis, Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi was sent out on a mission by Jedi masters Yoda and Mace Windu to safely deliver a message from the Jedi Council to their allies on the Core World of Albecus.

During Kenobi's flight to the Albecus system in his Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor, he was ambushed in an Asteroid belt by Slave I commanded by the bounty hunter Jango Fett. In deadly pursuit by the aggressive bounty hunter, Obi-Wan's ship is damaged by an asteroid and he is left no other choice but to engage Slave I by initiating fight mode. Fett is overwhelmed by the immense firepower of the Jedi starfighter and is forced to flee the battle, leaving Kenobi to continue on his journey and complete his mission.
